name: 郭忠義
objective: 智慧型代理人系統技術結合資料科學、人工智慧、分散式計算與網際網路技術，逐漸成為未來重要的資訊技術。本課程介紹智慧型代理人系統之理論、架構與應用。學生透過此課程實做一個智慧型代理人系統，以瞭解代理人技術與應用。課程主要內容包括 - 1.多代理人理論與架構，2. 機器學習與代理人調適，3. 協調技術，4. 合作與競爭，5.賽局理論與決策，6.大數據分析， 7.網路服務。
schedule:
1, 9/14, 9/15, Intelligent Agent Introduction, Agent Application,
2, 9/21, 9/22,   Proposition Login
3, 9/29, Proposition Login
4, 10/5, 10/6, Agent Knowledge Representation
5, 10/12, 10/13, Game theories and decision making
6, 10/19, 10/20, Fuzzy Set Theory
7, 10/26, 10/27, Fuzzy Set Theory
8, 11/2, 11/3, Fuzzy Set Theory
9, 11/9, 11/10, Midterm
10, 11/16, 11/17, Neural Network
11, 11/23, 11/24, Neural Network 
12, 11/30, 12/1, Decision Tree and AB Search, Genetic Algorithm  
13, 12/7, 12/8, Sampling Distribution
14, 12/14, 12/15, Hypothesis Testing
15, 12/21, 12/22, Hypothesis Testing
16, 12/28, 12/29,  Hypothesis Testing
17, 1/4, 1/5, Linear Regression, Logistic Regression
18, 1/12, Final
scorePolicy:

materials:
Text Book
Course materials are selected from a number of books, research documents and journal papers and will be delivered on each session.
Reference:
1. The Agent-Oriented Software Engineering Handbook, Springer. 
2. Nathan Griffiths, Kuo-Ming Chao, Agent-Based Service-Oriented Computing, Springer.
